metadata.name: Camera Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. It allows you to move the camera around when the game is paused. Note: this only works in large rooms.
There's 2 ways to interact with this mod: [list] [*]Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you move the camera around the room. [*]Press Esc/Start to pause the game. On keyboard, player 1 can use WASD to move the camera. On controller, player 1 can use the right thumbstick to move the camera. You can also use your mouse to click on different parts of the room. If you don't have a cursor then enable Mouse Control via Repentogon's Game Options (and restart the game). Recommendation: install a minimal pause menu mod so you can actually see the room when paused. [/list]
Minimal pause menu mods (search the workshop for more): [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2802678835]Mini pause menu[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2802679084]Mini pause menu+[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2769063897]unintrusive pause menu[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2820930551]Inscryption Pause Menu[/url] [/list]
